verses.roman:
pūrve bhāla chila ei nimāi paṇḍita
gayā haite āsiyā cālāya viparīta

synonyms: pūrve—before this; bhāla—very good; chila—was; ei—this; nimāi paṇḍita—of the name Nimāi Paṇḍita; gayā—Gayā (a place of pilgrimage); haite—from; āsiyā—coming; cālāya—conducts; viparīta—just the opposite.
translation: " 'Nimāi Paṇḍita was previously a very good boy, but since He has returned from Gayā He conducts Himself differently.
